name: Demon heart
description:
Welcome to Demon heart. Accompany Syael in her journey to the other world where demons live on floating islands. Find out what happened on every island. Investigate who and why did this.
Defeat island masters and talk to them. Meet the demon royal family.
Which side will you choose? Will you find demons' heart delicious?
In this game you will find:
*5 unique islands
*Bosses that demand a specific approach to each one
*Puzzles with unobvious solutions
*Arcade machine without winning
*Completely different characters
*Heaps of treasure and cakes
*Store where nothing will be sold to you
*WALKING
*Three different endings
